show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: The Gradual Erosion Of Civil Liberties

title: The Gradual Erosion Of Civil Liberties
content:
Individual rights have been eroded so slowly, nobody notices anymore. Constitutional protections no longer exist. <!--more--> The most blatant, illegal power-grabs occur in local government.
We hear from Dick Morris talking about the work-week.
Bank lending has surged recently but for the wrong reasons.
According to the Associated Press, 4 out of 5 US adults struggle with joblessness and/or welfare at some point in their lives.
Alan Grayson talks about American hypocrisy in the Crimean affair followed by a short commentary from Paul Craig Roberts on the same subject.
A quick update on Obamacare.
A brief comment on high-frequency trading.
A business idea from Simon Black.
More cold water thrown on “Globull Warming”.
The biggest property default ever in China.
